product_name: REI Lite-Core 1.5 Self-Inflating Pad - Special Buy
long_description: Travel light and sleep comfortably-weighing less than 2 pounds, the ultracompact REI Lite-Core 1.5 Self-Inflating Pad takes up precious little space in your backpack. X-Core foam insulation is cross-cored for maximum compressibility and weight reduction. Quick-closing, high-volume-airflow valve allows the pad to inflate and deflate quickly. Rugged Taslan(R) nylon diamond-ripstop top surface has a nonslip texture; 75-denier polyester bottom surface resists wear. Grippy silicone pattern on top surface helps keep sleeping bag from sliding off pad. Low-volume, tapered, mummy-shape design increases efficiency and compressibility. R-value equals 3.2; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). The REI Lite-Core 1.5 Self-Inflating Pad includes a stuff sack to protect pad during transport and ensure a compact parcel every time. Special buy.
